LocalID.submission_id: Gut microbial dysbiosis in young adults with obesity metagenomic assembly (assembled from PRJEB12123, internal_id: 7cf0d74f-cbce-4e43-a34d-a2f0d79996b2)

ProjectDescr.Title: EMG produced TPA metagenomics assembly of the Gut microbial dysbiosis in young adults with obesity (Gut microbial dysbiosis in young adults with obesity) data set.
ProjectDescr.Description: The Gut microbial dysbiosis in young adults with obesity Third Party Annotation (TPA) assembly was derived from the primary whole genome shotgun (WGS) data set: PRJEB12123. This project includes samples from the following biomes: Host-associated, Human, Digestive system, Large intestine, Fecal.

StructuredCitation.Title: EBI Metagenomics in 2017: enriching the analysis of microbial communities, from sequence reads to assemblies.

Author.Consortium: EMBL-EBI European Bioinformatics Institute, Wellcome Trust Genome Campus, Hinxton, Cambridge CB10 1SD, UK.
